1: <pb/>Ri Ajawaxel xuch'abej ri Job pa u niq'uiajil ri sutinel quiakik'. <pb/>Ri Ajawaxel xubij:
2: <pb/><t>“¿Jachin ri at</t> <t>chi caqueblaj a c'u'x</t> <t>che ri e nu yo'm u bixic cac'ut c'ut</t> <t>cumal tak ri e a tzij</t> <t>chi man c'o ta aweta'm?</t>
3: <t>Chac'utu' ri a chuk'ab chnuwäch,</t> <t>chebatzelej c'ut qui wäch</t> <t>ri c'otoj tak chi'aj</t> <t>ri quebenban chawe:</t>
4: <t>¿Jawije' at c'o wi</t> <t>aretak ri in</t> <t>co xintiq'uiba' ri uwächulew?</t> <t>¡Chabij chwe,</t> <t>we kas nim ri awetamabal!</t>
5: <t>¿La aweta'm jachin</t> <t>xyo'w u bixic joropa' ta chetanic,</t> <t>xukuje' jachin ri ajchac ri xbanowic?</t>
6: <t>¿Jas puwi' tac'al wi</t> <t>ri e u tac'alibal?</t> <t>¿Jachin xcojow ri abaj</t> <t>ri t'uyul wi ronojel,</t>
7: <t>quebixon c'ut ri ch'imil</t> <t>rech chuxo'l ri qui quicotemal</t> <t>ri e pataninel tak wech aj caj?</t>
8: <pb/><t>Aretak xpok'colij ulok ri plo</t> <t>chupam ri ulew,</t> <t>¿jachin xecojow k'atibal</t> <t>rech cäk'atitajic?</t>
9: <t>Ri in xinya' jun sutz' che ratz'iak,</t> <t>are c'u ri mayul</t> <t>che u pam tak ratz'iak.</t>
10: <t>In xincoj jun k'atibal</t> <t>rech ri plo xincoj lawe</t> <t>che qui tz'apixic</t> <t>tak ri k'atibal tak rech.</t>
11: <t>In xinbij che:</t> <t>‘Cätopan c'ä waral,</t> <t>man catoc'ow ta c'u waral;</t> <t>waral quepak'in wi tak ri a ployil</t> <t>ri kas banal nimal.’</t>
12: <t>¿La c'o jumul pa ri a c'aslemal</t> <t>e a yo'm tak takanic</t> <t>chi chpet ri sak chuxe' ri caj</t> <t>chc'utun ta c'u ri k'ij?</t>
13: <t>¿Chi chujabuj ta c'u rib</t> <t>ri sakilal cho ri uwächulew</t> <t>che qui c'u' ta c'u quib</t> <t>tak ri banal tak etzelal?</t>
14: <t>Quek'alajin tak c'u na</t> <t>ri e u chi' tak ri ulew</t> <t>cäk'otaj c'ut ri u ca'yebal</t> <t>jacha' jun atz'iak;</t>
15: <t>cäk'il ri qui chäj</t> <t>ri e banal tak etzelal</t> <t>caq'uis c'u u tza'm ri cojow xib.</t>
16: <pb/><t>¿La asolim</t> <t>ri mayibalalaj k'ekumalil</t> <t>jawije' ri c'o wi ri u q'uiyibal</t> <t>ri nimalaj plo?</t>
17: <t>¿La awilom</t> <t>jawije' tak e c'o wi ri oquibal</t> <t>jawije' cäban wi oquem</t> <t>chupam ri xibibalalaj ajawibal</t> <t>re ri cämical?</t>
18: <t>¿La ach'obom</t> <t>ri u wäch ri uwächulew?</t> <t>¡Chabij chwe,</t> <t>we kas aweta'm ronojel!</t>
19: <pb/><t>¿Jawije' e c'olotal wi ri sakilal</t> <t>xukuje' ri k'ekumalil?</t>
20: <t>¿La aweta'm jas caban chque</t> <t>rech quebopan c'ä</t> <t>pa ri q'uisbal jutz' quetzelej ta</t> <t>chi c'u chupam ri cachoch?</t>
21: <t>¡Takal chawe chi aweta'm,</t> <t>sibalaj e q'ui chic</t> <t>ri a junab at alam</t> <t>chi c'u ri' aretak xebanic!</t>
22: <pb/><t>¿La e asolim tak ri c'olbal</t> <t>ri nu c'olom wi ri tew</t> <t>xukuje' ri sakbach</t>
23: <t>che qui takic bic pa tak ri k'ijol</t> <t>rech ri u q'ueyowal,</t> <t>pa tak ri k'ijol re tijoj chuk'ab</t> <t>xukuje' re ch'o'j?</t>
24: <t>¿Jachique tak ri be</t> <t>ri quebutakej ri sakilal</t> <t>aretak cujach rib?</t> <t>¿Jas ri cuban ri quiakik'</t> <t>rech ri elebal k'ij culic' rib</t> <t>chuwäch ri uwächulew?</t>
25: <t>¿Jachin xjakow ri quel wi</t> <t>ulok ri jäb</t> <t>cuc'ut ta c'ut u be ri nimalaj jäb,</t>
26: <t>rech cäjabin pa ri chaki'j uwo sak,</t> <t>jawije' ri man c'o ta wi jun winak.</t>
27: <t>Rech cuja'j ri ulew ri tolonic</t> <t>cuq'uiyisaj c'u ulok ri k'ayes?</t>
28: <pb/><t>¿Jachin ri u tat ri jäb</t> <t>xukuje' ri räxk'ab?</t>
29: <t>¿Jachin ri u nan</t> <t>ri tew ri cabajiric</t> <t>xukuje' ri tew ri cut'ab rib?</t>
30: <t>¿Jachin cabanow co che ri ja'</t> <t>ri jacha' abaj curabajirisaj c'ut</t> <t>ri u wi' ri nimalaj plo?</t>
31: <pb/><t>¿La at catbanowic chi</t> <t>man caquijach ta quib ri mutz</t> <t>qui jachom c'u quib ri ch'imil</t> <t>re ri Orion?</t>
32: <t>¿La at ri catesan ulok</t> <t>tak ri ch'imil pa ri u k'ijol?</t> <t>¿La at ri catc'amow qui be</t> <t>tak ri e u ch'imil ri nimalaj Os</t> <t>xukuje' ri e rech ri Os ri ch'utin?</t>
33: <t>¿La e aweta'm tak ri pixab</t> <t>ri quebajawin puwi' ri caj?</t> <t>¿La at ri catcojow tak we pixab ri'</t> <t>puwi' ri uwächulew?</t>
34: <t>¿La catcuinic caya' takanic</t> <t>chque tak ri sutz'</t> <t>chi catquibik'tajisaj ruc' ja'?</t>
35: <t>We catak ri cakulja' chi cabe</t> <t>pa jun c'olbal,</t> <t>¿la cubij puch chawe:</t> <t>‘In c'olic ri', chinataka'?’</t>
36: <t><f>[6]</f>¿Jachin xyo'w</t> <t>ri utzalaj quetamanic</t> <t>tak ri chicop ri c'o ri xic'</t> <t>jacha' ri ibis o ri ama' ec'?</t>
37: <t>¿Jachin ta ri sibalaj ajno'j</t> <t>chi reta'm taj</t> <t>e joropa' ri sutz' e c'olic?</t> <t>¿Jachin ta ri cacuinic quebuk'ijo</t> <t>rech quequiya' ri qui jäb,</t>
38: <t>rech ri puc'uc' ulew cut'ac rib</t> <t>caquit'aquila' c'u quib</t> <t>ri t'acat'ak tak ulew?</t>
39: <pb/><t>¿La at ri quebatzucuj</t> <t>tak ri qui ti'</t> <t>tak ri ati'tab tak coj,</t> <t>rech quewi' ri alaj tak cal</t> <t>c'ä quenoj na,</t>
40: <t>aretak caquic'uquib</t> <t>pa ri c'ubal tak quib</t> <t>o caquiwuk' quib pa ri patzapic k'ayes</t> <t>che u chapic jun qui ti'?</t>
41: <t>¿Jachin cayo'w ri caquiwe'j</t> <t>tak ri joj,</t> <t>aretak ri alaj tak cal</t> <t>caquitzucuj ri caquiwe'j</t> <t>ruc' c'u rakoj tak chi'aj</t> <t>caquitz'onoj chwe?”</t>
